description.value: You attack carefully to knock some sense into a creature whose actions aren't their own. Make a Strike against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused} ally. The Strike is nonlethal and doesn't take a -2 penalty for using a weapon without the nonlethal trait; if you hit and deal damage, your ally automatically succeeds at the flat check to remove the confused condition when taking damage.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
